text: Ivyo vyose n’ukubera intumwa z’Imana zabo zaguma zibashikira zifise ivyemezo biri k’umugaragaro, mugabo bavuga bati:- abantu nkatwe nibo boturongora? Kuri ivyo barahakanye n’uguhindukira kurundi ruhande, n’Imana ntaco ikeneye, ahubwo irihagije kubwayo, kandi niyo ihayagizwa gusumba ibindi vyose
